content: haunt your living room with this crochet ghost pillow stitched in caron one pound you ll create a huggable pillow using single_crochet assembly and chain stitch techniques standing at an intimidating 18 tall it s a playful décor item or cuddly pillow for the kids room make a host of ghosts in different colors and haunt every corner of your home materials caron® one pound™ 16 oz/454 g 812 yds/742 m main color mc white 10501 1 ball or 378 yds/346 m contrast a black 10503 1 ball or 20 yds/18 m measurement approx 18 45 5 cm tall
